2.1.4.en: Updates to README.txt to pass the certification

2.2.0.en: Added triggers for the begin and end of the announced time frame of delivery

2.2.1.en: Fixed stupid typo in the Dutch translation

2.2.4.en: Fixing bug that would expire your session after 2 weeks

2.2.5.en: Changing readme files to comply with Athom's standards

2.3.0.en: Fixed API endpoint, removed speech input and improved polling intervals

3.0.2.en: Bugfix in order delivered trigger, removed trigger tokens

3.2.1.en: Bugfix in start and end window trigger

3.2.2.en: Bugfix to prevent unnecessary firing of triggers after update

3.2.5.en: Bugfix adding product IDs as String upon API change

3.2.6.en: Reduce default poll interval to prevent missing order trigger

3.2.7.en: Bugfix triggers being reran on restart of the app

3.3.0.en: Adding support for German customers of Picnic
